component.name: UnCSO2
component.summary: Extract Counter-Strike: Online 2 and Titanfall Online game files

description.p: A file data extractor for the video games Counter Strike: Online 2 and Titanfall Online.
Aside from extracting files from Counter-Strike: Online 2's and Titanfall Online's proprietary archive format, PKG, UnCSO2 can:

ul.li: Explore and extract from individual PKG archives
Explore and extract from entire game's filesystem (loads every PKG archive in their PKG index)
Preview and/or extract individual file entries
Decrypt Counter-Strike: Online 2 files with an .e* prepended in their extension

description.p: UnCSO2 supports every Counter-Strike: Online 2 region's game data. Those regions are: South Korea, China, Taiwan and Japan.

description.p: Now also packaged as Flatpak! Changes:

ul.li: support saving last index dir path
fixed recent file list and made it also list directories
fixed broken style of error banner (it had unreadable text)
fixed blurry window icon on Linux
support for Flatpak build on Linux (with fixes around its filesystem sandboxing)
minor stylistic corrections here and there
add MIME types to allow opening .pkg files or their folders in the app
fixed Titanfall Online support (notably no longer has problems with the infamous big shader file)
